title: MeetingLens
description:
MeetingLens is an AI-driven tool designed for B2B sales reps, startup founders, investors, and consultants who need to quickly understand a company and its attendees before a meeting.

MeetingLens automates meeting prep with a few key details (name, company), pulls relevant public data (from sources like Apollo and the company website), and uses AI to generate a concise meeting brief which includes role context, company intel, recent activity, and tailored discovery questions all under a minute.
